ai-snp2.13:1.1_0: “I ask the sage of abundant wealth,
ai-snp2.13:1.4_0: How would a mendicant fully extinguished in the world?
ai-snp2.13:2.5_0: they’d rightly give rise to heaven.
ai-snp2.13:3.2_0: even though they grieve in sensual pleasures.
ai-snp2.13:3.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:4.3_0: who has given up conceit and given up,
ai-snp2.13:4.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:5.2_0: by not grasping by relying on each other,
ai-snp2.13:5.3_0: The fetters are freed from fetters,
ai-snp2.13:5.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:6.1_0: He doesn’t be happy with trust,
ai-snp2.13:6.2_0: dispelling desire and greed for them;
ai-snp2.13:6.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:7.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:8.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:9.1_0: having given up greed and hate,
ai-snp2.13:9.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:10.2_0: and no-one would speak among them.
ai-snp2.13:10.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:11.4_0: are rightly freed in the world.
ai-snp2.13:12.4_0: they’d rightly give rise to heaven.
ai-snp2.13:13.2_0: Fases a wise one who understands
ai-snp2.13:13.3_0: Development of greed, hate, and delusion,
ai-snp2.13:13.4_0: they’d rightly give rise to heaven.
ai-snp2.13:14.2_0: master of the qualities, knowledge master,
ai-snp2.13:14.3_0: Choices are skilled in their knowledge;
ai-snp2.13:14.4_0: they’d rightly give rise to heaven.
ai-snp2.13:15.2_0: has reached the peak of material possessions.
ai-snp2.13:15.4_0: they’d rightly give rise to heaven.
ai-snp2.13:16.1_0: having understood the teaching and training,
ai-snp2.13:16.4_0: they’d become fully extinguished in the world.”
ai-snp2.13:17.1_0: “Indeed, Blessed One, this is the time,
ai-snp2.13:17.4_0: you’ll rightly give rise to heaven.”
ai-snp2.13:17.5_0: Hopes rightly comprehending the Palace of Victory.
